name: Jungle Train driving: Passenger transport Game
name_original: Jungle Train driving: Passenger transport Game
description:
Are you crazy about to drive your own train simulator?
Driver this Passenger train on real rail tracks and test your ability to become a subway driver, this complete railway system is built for common man to travel in country side areas, the forest. Pick and drop them from different railway stations like paris and Moscow. Drive the train from one rail station to next. and earn the money you always wanted.
you really like bullet train driver to test your skills.
Features:

- Realistic Train stations
- Gorgeous environment
- Stop and Start the train
- Animated people entering/exiting the train
- Amazing countryside places
- Intuitive train controls
- Realistic hd graphics
- For kid and adults
